paper_keywords: Numerical treatment of subsets of R-d
paper_abstract: The notion of a system of sets generated by a family of functionals is introduced. A generalization of the classical support function of convex subsets of R-d allows to transfer the concept of the convex hull to these systems of sets. Approximation properties of the generalized convex hull and its use for practical computations are investigated.
paper_title: Non-convex systems of sets for numerical analysis
